original_text: They decided that they would not listen to God's rules or to the messages from the prophets. But the Lord Almighty had sent those messages by His Spirit. So I, the Lord Almighty, was very angry.
korean_text: 그 마음을 금강석 같게 하여 율법과 만군의 여호와가 그의 영으로 옛 선지자들을 통하여 전한 말을 듣지 아니하므로 큰 진노가 만군의 여호와께로부터 나왔도다

sentences.original_text: They decided that they would not listen to God's rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 규율에 귀를 기울이지 않기로 결정했으며

sentences.original_text: or to the messages from the prophets
But the Lord Almighty had sent those messages
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 전능하신 주께서는 그 메시지들을 보내셨는데

sentences.original_text: So I, the Lord Almighty, was very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나 전능하신 주가 심히 노하였다
